import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import useCartContext from "../../store/CartContext"; import { createBuyOrder} from "../../data/index"; import { getAllShipping } from "../../data/index"; function CartView() { const {cart, removeFromCart, clearCart,restaItems, calcPriceCart , agregaItems, } = useCartContext(); function handleBuy(){ const itemsToBuy = cart.map((item) => ( { title: item.title, price: item.precio, cant: item.cant, id: item.id, } )) const buyOrder = { buyer:{ name: "Carlos", email: "carlos@shop.com", phone: "5493415839183", }, items: itemsToBuy, total: calcPriceCart(), } createBuyOrder(buyOrder) } function shippingType(){ const shipping = getAllShipping().then((respuestaPromise) => { return respuestaPromise }); } if (cart.length === 0){ return

No hay items en en el carrito

Volver para comprar

} } export default CartView
